contentencoded: Over the past few months, we’ve brought you conversations about how children learn to read, the college debt crisis, the nature of creativity and more. Talking about education is still part of the plan. But this week, and throughout February, we’ll be focusing on the history of race in America – starting with this 2007 documentary that looks back at the evolution of school desegregation.
